metadata.Title: CVE-2022-35472 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - negligible.
metadata.Description: OTFCC v0.10.4 was discovered to contain a global overflow via /release-x64/otfccdump+0x718693.

notes.Note: ebarretto> From Debian: The otfccdump binary is not build by any source package, hence we are not affected. Yes, we carry the source code of the program, but we don't use it.

criterions.comment: texlive-bin: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
